comments.body: Guacamole's jsdoc lies about this being a boolean. Both in their client [implementation](https://github.com/apache/guacamole-client/blob/11c1575daf58111049f4c5cc1cd6ea1b01d5ee9c/guacamole/src/main/frontend/src/app/client/directives/guacClient.js#L425) and rhyme.com passing a boolean doesn't work; one has to pass `1` or `0`

I mistakenly put the concrete type here instead of the parent type: https://github.com/apache/guacamole-client/blob/754e9649f1fa0ba225ee42b56ded64bc283d17df/guacamole-common-js/src/main/webapp/modules/Client.js#L28
